Package org.vanted.scaling.resources

High DPI (4K and above) Swing Support: scaling-relevant resources.
Since:
2.6.4
Version:
0.8
Author:
D. Garkov
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ImmutableCheckBox
    A JCheckBox that remains unchanged regardless of the scaling.
    ImmutableSlider
    A JSlider that remains unchanged regardless of the scaling.
    ScaledFontUIResource
    Customized FontUIResource class.
    ScaledIcon
    Given a regular Icon this would produce a scaled clone of it.
